Pre-Game Insights: Germany defender Antonio Rüdiger emphasized the need for humility despite hosting the tournament.
Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann expressed anticipation for the event, noting it's a huge global spectacle.
Scotland forward Ryan Christie highlighted the importance of a strong start and reaching the knockout stage for the first time.
Scotland has shown improvement in recent years, including victories over Spain and Norway during qualification.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland fans are out in large numbers in Munich, proudly wearing their team jerseys often combined with kilts.
There are hardly any sightings of Germany shirts or flags among the local population.
Deniz Undav has challenged Thomas Müller to shave his head if Germany wins the championship.
